info.author: Alfredo Beaumont
classifiers: License :: OSI Approved :: GNU General Public License (GPL)
info.description:
wxSFTP is a simple, easy to use and portable SFTP client. 

With simple we mean that the program will have only the main features needed.
The structure consists of a two panel window, one for the local filesystem and
another for the remote filesystem. 

To be easy to use we are developing a graphical client that will be HIG
compliant. 

Portability is reached with language (python) and graphical library (wxpython).
We will try to maintain the portability these platforms give us.
info.name: wxSFTP
info.html_description:
wxSFTP is a simple, easy to use and portable SFTP client.

With simple we mean that the program will have only the main features needed. The structure consists of a two panel window, one for the local filesystem and another for the remote filesystem.

To be easy to use we are developing a graphical client that will be HIG compliant.

Portability is reached with language (python) and graphical library (wxpython). We will try to maintain the portability these platforms give us.
